Text: Yeah I can't figure out why she did this move, she's so much better than this.

I liked the movie, it can't go wrong with Kristin Kreuk in it :) The picture quality was great too. They only problem was that some parts of the movie was encrypted in some sort of chinese, cantonese, mandarin or what have you so I missed out on a lot of the dialog.
I have to admit, I've downloaded it just because of Kristin. :-" I'll definitely buy it too for the same reason. :P
